alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of central Kent, western Atlantic, Cumberland, Salem, Camden and Gloucester Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1129 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from West Deptford to Dover. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Dover, Millville, Bridgeton, Cumberland, Deptford, Voorhees, West Deptford, Glassboro, Lindenwold, Hammonton, Bellmawr, Woodbury, Pitman, Clayton, Berlin, Paulsboro, Buena, Magnolia and Westville. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 2 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 16 and 26. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 19 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
